showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
“Everyone…I'm sorry.
I don't know what to say…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cloud}
“I never was in SOLDIER.”{PAUSE}“I made up the story about what happened
five years ago and my
being in SOLDIER.”{PAUSE}“I left my village looking for glory,
but never made it into SOLDIER…”{PAUSE}“I was so ashamed of being so weak.
Then I heard this story from my friend Zack…”{PAUSE}“And I created an illusion of myself
made up of what I had seen in my life…”{PAUSE}“And I continued to play the
charade as if it were true.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Cloud}
“Physically, I'm built like
someone in SOLDIER.”{PAUSE}“Hojo's plan to clone Sephiroth
wasn't that difficult.”{PAUSE}“It was just the same procedure they use
when creating members of SOLDIER.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // {Cloud}
“You see, someone in SOLDIER
isn't simply exposed to Mako energy.”{PAUSE}“Their bodies are actually
injected with Jenova cells…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Cloud}
“For better or worse,
only the strong can enter SOLDIER.”{PAUSE}“It has nothing to do with
the Jenova Reunion.”{PAUSE}“But weak people…like me,
get lost in the whole thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cloud}
“The combination of Jenova cells,
Sephiroth's strong will,
and my own weakness are what created me.”{PAUSE}“Everyone knew that.
I'm…{Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“…the master of my own illusionary world.”{PAUSE}“But I can't remain trapped
in an illusion anymore…”{PAUSE}“I'm going to live my life
without pretending.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Cloud}
“…I'm the reason why Meteor
is falling towards us.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Cloud}
“That's why I have to do everything in my power
to fight this thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Cloud}
“It's like you always
told me, {Barret}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // “There ain't no gettin'
offa this train!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Cloud}
“…I hate moving vehicles.
I always get sick.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Cloud}
“But that's okay.
That's the real me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:31}); // “There ain't no gettin'
offa this train!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Barret}
“Illusion, huh?
Pretty damn strong for an illusion.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Barret}
“That means he ain't no
different from before!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Barret}
“Good!!
Then you're gonna keep
fightin' to save the Planet!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // {Barret}
“Oh, uh, you mean that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:32}); // “There ain't no gettin'
offa this train!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Red XIII}
“Don't say anything, {Cloud}.
All you've been doing is apologizing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Red XIII}
“What? I don't understand!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Cait Sith}
“By the way, {Cloud}.
What are you going to do now?”{PAUSE}“Don't tell me you're
going to leave the ship?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “Sorry!!
